entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.20.21
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • core: be tolerant of decryption issue (Lo√Øc Mathieu)

Chores

  • build: increase Gradle memory limits (yuri1969)
  • version: update to version 'v0.20.21' (brian.mulier)

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.20.22
entry.content:
Features

  • Unit Tests: add assertj dependency (nKwiatkowski)

Chores

  • version: update to version 'v0.20.22' (brian.mulier)

Commits

  • 899baf0: fix(core)!: prevent failing execution in case of duplicate label upon inheritance (brian.mulier)

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.16.19
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • align to EE (YannC)

Chores

  • change docker image used for DockerTaskRunnerTest (brian.mulier)
  • upgrade to version 0.16.19 (brian.mulier)

Commits

  • 5bd8183: fix(core)!: prevent failing execution in case of duplicate label upon inheritance (brian.mulier)

entry.title: New release for Kestra: v0.22.3
entry.content:
Features

  • Unit Tests: add assertj dependency (nKwiatkowski)

Bug Fixes

  • ui: allow tab button to take effect while using editor (MilosPaunovic)
  • core: bring back documentation on some plugins (#8354) (brian-mulier-p)

Chores

  • ci: modify publish docker to align on EE (YannC)
  • ui: remove reorder buttons when there's only one value in no code arrays (#8266) (Karuna Tata)
  • ui: amend scrollbar issue on the no code editor fields (#8216) (Piyush Bhaskar)
  • ui: improve the filter label colors on hover (#8141) (Piyush Bhaskar)
  • version: update changelog.md with details for v0.22.2 (MilosPaunovic)
  • version: upgrade to 0.22.3 (YannC.)

Commits

  • ci changes (#8217) (YannC)
  • 6d079e0: fix(core)!: prevent failing execution in case of duplicate label upon inheritance (brian.mulier)
  • 5a14b59: feat(core)*: close code tab if file is deleted (#8331) (Milo≈° Paunoviƒá)
  • a9eace9: chore(flows)*: hide horizontal scroll on editor based inputs (#8347) (Milo≈° Paunoviƒá)
  • 9e3372d: feat(core)*: introduce a dropdown menu for each panel (#8351) (Milo≈° Paunoviƒá)
  • 805c4d4: chore(translations)*: localize to languages other than english (#8353) (github-actions[bot])
  • 9abf19e: feat(core)*: allow closing all tabs at once in a single panel (#8360) (Milo≈° Paunoviƒá)
  • b6c0ac3: fix(flows)*: amend text color problem in no code editor on firefox (#8367) (Satvik Kushwaha)
